headline: Surface Disinfectant Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Reckitt Benckiser, Procter & Gamble, and 3M Lead Through Strategic Portfolio Focus, Market Expansion, and Operational Transformation
summary: Explore the comprehensive Surface Disinfectant Companies Quadrant, an in-depth analysis of the global surface disinfectant market. This report evaluates 92 companies, with the top 11 recognized as quadrant leaders. Surface disinfectants, formulated with active agents like quats, alcohols, and hydrogen peroxide, combat bacteria, viruses, and fungi on non-living surfaces, crucial for infection control in diverse sectors from healthcare to public spaces.
